title: HUD Secretary Dr. Ben Carson Discusses Gun Violence
itunes:title: HUD Secretary Dr. Ben Carson Discusses Gun Violence
description:
Housing and Urban Development Secretary Dr. Ben Carson discusses renewed momentum for action to address gun violence in the wake of mass shootings over the weekend in El Paso, Texas and Dayton, Ohio. He speaks on Bloomberg radio's "Sound On" with Kevin Cirilli, Chief Washington Correspondent for Bloomberg Television and Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
